GlobalVariables.StudyDescription: A simulated clinical trial to evaluate antiviral effectiveness

ItemRef.MethodOID: MT.Set to "Y" if TRTSDT is not missing, else "N"
MT.Set to 'Y' if DTHDTC is not missing, else blank

ItemGroupDef.Name: ADVS
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One or more records per subject per analysis parameter per analysis timepoint

ItemRef.MethodOID: MT.Derived by merging with ADSL using USUBJID to retrieve ACTARM as TRTA

ItemGroupDef.Name: ADAE
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per subject per adverse event

ItemRef.MethodOID: MT.Concatenated as catx('-', STUDYID, SUBJID) derived from original USUBJID
MT.Assigned sequentially by subject after sorting by AESTDTC and AETERM
MT.Derived from AESTDTC_num using put(AESTDTC_num, yymmdd10.)
MT.Derived from AEENDTC_num using put(AEENDTC_num, yymmdd10.)
MT.Set to "Y" if AEENRF = 'ONGOING', otherwise blank
MT.Taken from SUPPAE.QVAL where QNAM='AESOC' and IDVAR='AESEQ'
MT.Extracted from original USUBJID_OLD using substr(USUBJID_OLD, 5)

ItemGroupDef.Name: SUPPAE
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per IDVAR, IDVARVAL, and QNAM value per subject

Description.TranslatedText: Date of First Exposure to Treatment
Date of Last Exposure to Treatment
Reported Term for the Adverse Event
Study Day of Start of AE
Study Day of End of AE

CodeListItem.CodedValue: General disorders and administration site conditions

Decode.TranslatedText: General disorders and administration site conditions

CodeListItem.CodedValue: General disorders and administration site conditions

Decode.TranslatedText: General disorders and administration site conditions

MethodDef.Name: AESEQ
MethodDef.FormalExpression: Assigned sequentially within subject sorted by AESTDTC and AETERM

Description.TranslatedText: Study Day of Start of AE
Study Day of End of AE

MethodDef.Name: AESOC
MethodDef.FormalExpression: Taken from SUPPAE.QVAL where QNAM='AESOC' and IDVAR='AESEQ'

Description.TranslatedText: Date of First Exposure to Treatment
Date of Last Exposure to Treatment

MethodDef.Name: SAFFL
MethodDef.FormalExpression: Set to "Y" if TRTSDT is not missing, else "N"

MethodDef.Name: DTHFL
MethodDef.FormalExpression: Set to "Y" if DTHDTC is not missing, else blank

MethodDef.Name: TRTA
MethodDef.FormalExpression: Derived by merging with ADSL using USUBJID to retrieve ACTARM as TRTA
